sentence.Network_en: 'It is always as the good patriot says,'observed the functionary.
sentence.Network_cn: “ 这位好心的爱国者说的话总是对的, ” 那官员说.

sentence.Network_en: 'Emigrant ,'said the functionary,'I am going to send you on to Paris, under an escort.'
sentence.Network_cn: “ 外逃分子, ” 那官员说, “ 我要把你送到巴黎去, 还派人护送. ”

entry.tran: (尤指为政府或政党服务的)行政人员，官员
entry.def: A functionary is a person whose job is to do administrative work, especially for a government or a political party.

means.word_mean: 1. a worker who holds or is invested with an office
